title: Draven Mode down?
body: Please tell me that the mode is down because draven is infiltrating rito servers to try and maximize draven mode and instead activates URF draven. I mean Urfkench can't be just a skin. Plz for the love of manatee let it be

replies.body:
Draven mode has been cancelled due to the negative response from the community.

Draven game mode is suppose to last all weekend long. The fact that its no longer available means they got the message. 

Thank god!
On top of it i was too tired on the 1st of APRIL and didn't play Blind pic Draven mode. .. and i REALLY was looking forward to play it on the 2nd one :/ Why, RIOT?? ?

Nah they took it down because everyone said it was bad, which it it, but still kinda pissed that they just take away the April Fools event completely just because people didn't like it. Seriously, what is Riot doing over there these days?
